name: The Coca-Cola Company
brief_description: The Coca‑Cola Company is a total beverage company with products sold in more than 200 countries and territories. They sell multiple billion-dollar brands across several beverage categories worldwide. Their portfolio includes Coca‑Cola, Sprite, Fanta, Dasani, smartwater, vitaminwater, Topo Chico, BODYARMOR, Powerade, Costa, Georgia, Gold Peak, Ayataka, Minute Maid, Simply, innocent, Del Valle, fairlife and AdeS.
services: Production and distribution of beverages including soft drinks, water, sports drinks, coffee, tea, juice, dairy, and plant-based beverages.

name: Ternium
brief_description: Ternium (NYSE:TX) is the largest steel producer in Latin America with production centers in Argentina, Brazil, Colombia, the United States, Guatemala, and Mexico. The company also participates in the control group of Usiminas, a leading company in the Brazilian steel market.
services: Ternium produces high-end steel products for industries such as construction, automotive, household appliances, capital goods, packaging, food, and energy. They also focus on digital transformation, research, development processes, and the creation of new products with the highest technology.
